name: CooperativePushBlock
setup: Several agents in an arena with blocks of different sizes that must be pushed into a goal zone; large blocks require cooperation.
goal: Push all blocks into the goal, coordinating on large blocks that a single agent cannot move quickly.

agents.description: Three agents that share a group reward and observe each other through a grid sensor.

terms: +1, +2, or +3 group reward when a small, medium, or large block reaches the goal.

behavior_parameters.vector_observation_space: None; observations come from a grid sensor that encodes blocks, goal, walls, and teammates.
behavior_parameters.actions: 1 discrete branch with 7 actions (rotate left/right, move in four directions, or stay still).
